snippet.title: The Sims 2 - Pet Stories Official Trailer (PC)
snippet.description:
(Windows 2000/98/XP)

Play through a directed storyline in Story Mode, or go your own way in Classic Mode.  Use your own IM amd e-mail while playing the game in its own window. Laptop-friendly design - play even when you're on the go!
